instructions:
Mix sour cream and dressing until well blended.
Stir in spinach, carrots and peppers. Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.
Serve as a dip with the crackers.
ingredients: 1 cup BREAKSTONE'S Reduced Fat or KNUDSEN Light Sour Cream
1/4 cup KRAFT LIGHT DONE RIGHT! Ranch Reduced Fat Dressing
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed, well drained
title: Spinach Ranch Dip
